product_Description: Clinwue Refreshing facewash for a revitalizing and invigorating cleanse.
product_Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Glycerin, Fragrance, etc.
how_To_Use: Apply on wet face, lather, and rinse thoroughly for a refreshing feel.

product_Description: Cerabhi facewash for a gentle and hydrating skincare routine.
product_Ingredients: Ceramides, Aloe Vera Extract, Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, etc.
how_To_Use: Wet face, apply the facewash, massage, and rinse off with water.

product_Description: Nivea Men facewash for effective cleansing and freshness.
product_Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, etc.
how_To_Use: Gently apply on wet face, lather, and rinse off for a refreshed look.

product_Description: Cetaphill facewash for gentle cleansing suitable for all skin types.
product_Ingredients: Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, etc.
how_To_Use: Apply and massage on wet face, rinse off thoroughly for clean and soft skin.

product_Description: Vaseline facewash for moisturizing and nourishing the skin.
product_Ingredients: Petrolatum, Glycerin, Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, etc.
how_To_Use: Wet face, apply, and massage in circular motions. Rinse off with water.

product_Description: Pure Loc facewash for a clean and fresh feel with natural ingredients.
product_Ingredients: Aqua, Aloe Vera Gel, Lemon Extract, Coconut Oil, etc.
how_To_Use: Apply on damp face, lather, and rinse off for a pure and radiant complexion.
